name: GPT-UA
title: GPT-UA: ChatGPT free without registration: Claude 3, GPT-4o Vision, Mixtral-8X22B, Dall-E 3, LLAMA-3
welcomeMessage: We've created a group where you can ask questions and stay updated with the latest site news:

errors.internal: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.notEnoughDetails: Please provide more details for your request.
errors.insecureContext: This feature is only available in a secure context (HTTPS) in some or all supported browsers.
errors.apiKey: The API '{{key}}' is not attached to any budget. Please, make sure the site URL is correct.

topUpQuestion: Have you topped up the website's budget?
chipTooltip: This is the amount of money from the website's shared budget that you have spent.

mode.note_default: A cost-effective and fast mode, recommended for most everyday tasks. You can attach up to five images and/or PDF documents.
mode.note_gpt4: A more advanced model that can understand complex questions, generate photos, and research information online, but it's more expensive.
mode.note_mistral+: An open-source model developed in the EU with fewer restrictions, works best in English.
mode.note_llama: An advanced, open-source model by Meta, suitable for complex text tasks, optimized for English, supports multilingual use.
mode.note_naviguru: Specializes in creating detailed customized Google Maps routes with specific stopping points.
